code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import'./RoomList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RoomList=_ref=>{let{rooms,currentRoom,onRoomSelect}=_ref;if(rooms.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No rooms yet"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Create one to get started!"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"room-list",children:rooms.map((room,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"room-item ".concat((currentRoom===null||currentRoom===void 0?void 0:currentRoom.id)===room.id?'active':''),onClick:()=>onRoomSelect(room),initial:{opacity:0,x:-20},animate:{opacity:1,x:0},transition:{delay:index*0.05},whileHover:{x:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"room-icon",children:room.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"room-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:room.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"room-description",children:room.description||'No description'})]}),room.member_count>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"room-members",children:room.member_count})]},room.id))});};export default RoomList;
